Name: Mark of the Void
About the game: Welcome soldier, to the planet of Providia IV. A planet overrun with evil, corruption, and the source of the universes ruin, VOID! As a member of the profound and legendary army known as The Guardians, Tim finds himself tasked with the mission of heading down to the planet by himself and finding and destroying the source of the corruption! If he fails in his mission than this planet will be another base for the VOID to use against the Guardians and the rest of the universe! Along the way he will be making tons of new allies, facing fearsome foes, and even helping tons of people! Play through an old style RPG with your agility determining who goes first and how often you act before the enemy does! Gain new equipment to boost your stats to give you an edge in combat against all foes and work with all allies you gain to strategize and plan out your moves to best defeat your enemies!
